GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.30 to before v5.4.168
GSD.description:
igbvf: fix double free in `igbvf_probe`

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.168 by commit 8addba6cab94ce01686ea2e80ed1530f9dc33a9a, it was introduced in version v2.6.30 by commit d4e0fe01a38a073568aee541a0247fe734095979. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.details:
igbvf: fix double free in `igbvf_probe`

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.168 by commit 8addba6cab94ce01686ea2e80ed1530f9dc33a9a, it was introduced in version v2.6.30 by commit d4e0fe01a38a073568aee541a0247fe734095979. For more details please see the references link.
